transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Thanks. Please stay on the line.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir, Sahil ji baat kar rahe hain.
Customer: Bolie.
Executive: Sahil ji, main Swapnil Tiwari baat kar raha hun India Mart se senior manager baat kar raha tha recording line pe, kaise hain?
Customer: Hmm, bas badhiya.
Executive: Bataye sir aapne call kiya tha abhi just.
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Baat karoge nahi tha idhar beta ji.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir bataye aapne call kiya tha na main abhi meeting mein tha us time pe. Haan wo 10 minute mein aapko call karunga.
Executive: Thik hai okay.
Customer: Isi number pe karu?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had called earlier.



Resolution:

- Executive will call the customer back in 10 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call back in 10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call, meeting, follow-up
